net.jnellis.binpack

Interface Bin<P extends Comparable<P>,C extends Comparable<C>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CapacitySupport<C>, Comparable<Bin<P,C>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinearBin

    public interface Bin<P extends Comparable<P>,C extends Comparable<C>>
extends Comparable<Bin<P,C>>, CapacitySupport<C>
    A packing bin used by BinPacker. A bin has a capacity, can contain pieces, has a means to determine if a piece can fit in the bin and finally if the bin was 'existing.' An existing bin means it was not created during the packing operation but exists as a given bin with the intention that it represents results from a previous or partial packing operation.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.jnellis.binpack.CapacitySupport

    • Method Detail

      • add

        boolean add(P piece)
        Add a piece to this bin. The piece should be checked by calling canFit(P) first.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to add.
        Returns:
        true if the piece was added.

      • compareTo

        default int compareTo(Bin<P,C> o)
        Compare two bins based on their maximum remaining capacity.
        Specified by:

      • canFit

        boolean canFit(P piece)
        Determines if the offered piece will fit in the bin.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to fit.
        Returns:
        true if the piece will fit.

      • isExisting

        boolean isExisting()
        Returns whether this bin is an existing bin and not created on the fly during a previous packing operation.
        Returns:
        true if this is an existing bin.

      • getPieces

        List<P> getPieces()
        The pieces contained in the bin.
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of current pieces in this bin.
